attributes.additional_details: MyHermes fail to deliver an exceptionally large number of parcels on a daily basis. We deserve better!
attributes.background:
MyHermes are by far the worst couriers known to man. They fail the simplest of tasks such as delivering a parcel, or opening a communal front door to access a building.

Please sign this petition for MyHermes to cease trading and retailers to stop relying on them for delivery of customer parcels.
